text:
Hon. Oren Harris
April 21, 1961
I am enclosing a current schedule of television programming in Oregon
for your information. If there is any other way I can be of assistance
to your committee as it examines this important legislation, please
call upon me.
JWS:k /
Cy-Governor Mark O. Hatfield/
Enel. ^
Bl. cy-Harold E. Hill ^
Administrative Vice President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C.
